Description:
SIMPLY STUNNING IN EVERY DETAIL
EX DISPLAY IN TIMBER TOP
This four-year-old ex display Yarrabank home has been built with luxury in mind. This blue-chip location with perfect kerb appeal features 3 double bedrooms + a study. The master has walk in robe, ensuite with double basin and double shower. Remaining 3 bedrooms have their own wing and a super modern bathroom with dual vanities. Living spaces consists of sunken all-inclusive of home theatre room and system for entertaining the family. A central living space is dazzling with the kitchen/dining/living room being the hub of the home and showcased by a stunning raked ceiling with excellent natural light.
You will enjoy cooking in this modern deluxe kitchen with quantum quartz stone benchtops, soft close cabinets and stainless-steel appliances.
The main living / dining area has sliding door access to a beautifully positioned alfresco with café blinds and a professionally landscaped easy-care garden, the ideal setting to relax in the private outdoor living area.
This modern home is a polished package with many upgrades that come with ex display homes and includes: Double remote garage, breakfast bar, home theatre system, ducted gas heating, split system air conditioning, appealing timber look floors, modern décor, quality carpet, CCTV, weathermatic water system and more.
Located in Timbertop Estate you are minutes to the freeway and Beaconsfield shopping area.
Save yourself the time and hassle of building and move straight in.

Description:
First Class Elegance
This beautifully designed home is perfectly suited to first home buyers, investors or downsizer/retirees. Beyond the exposed aggregate driveway and striking modern facade, sits this residence with more tech upgrades than you could imagine.
From the moment you enter, you will be taken by the 9" ceilings and sophisticated timber flooring throughout the kitchen and living areas. The galley style kitchen offers an impressive practical lay out and features quality stainless-steel appliances, stone benchtops, dishwasher, plumbing to the fridge as well as the added luxury of a walk-in pantry.
Further offering 3 stylish bedrooms all presented complete with ceiling fans, their own air-conditioners and BIR's. There is a family bathroom plus separate toilet to accommodate guests. The master suite, complete with WIR and ensuite featuring a large shower and attractive shower niche tiles.
Other value-added extras include
• Efficient LED downlights inside and out
• Fibre internet to garage and extensive data cabling throughout
• Home Office with ample storage including overhead cupboards and built-in desk
• Ceiling fans in all rooms
• 2 x AC split systems - 1 to living, multi-head units to all bedrooms and office
• TV points in all rooms
• Ample power points in all rooms
• Ducted vac system
If safety and security are important to you? Feel at peace with the Environexus home automation system with integrated keyless front door entry, Crimsafe security doors and screens, sensor lights, window locks, alarm and commercial grade security IP camera system.
The rear sliding doors open up to a sizeable Colorbond covered pitched roof pergola, outdoor entertaining area with spotted gum decking, bamboo fence panel and large colour bond shed. The double garage is complete with remote control door, internal access and rear roller door with a home office built inside.
Situated on a 324m2 approx. allotment, this gorgeous home is positioned in the Arcadia Estate only a short stroll to shopping centres, parklands and Club Officer. With easy access to the M1 freeway and the Cardinia Road Train Station, this home has all you could want and more.
Is quality, elegance and class is what you're looking for? Then this house will become the perfect home for you.
Arrange an inspection as this will sell quickly.

Description:
When Quality and Class Combine
With an ideal location close to all of Officer's amenities including zoned schools, parkland, shops and public transport this impressive home will suit a huge range of buyers. Built by Fairhaven homes to the highest standards and with a free flowing layout, this contemporary masterpiece will impress you from the moment you enter.
Featuring:
* Three bedrooms, the master having a walk in robe and huge ensuite
* Open plan family room and meals area with striking flooring
* Separate lounge room/ home theatre room ideal for watching the latest blockbuster movie
* Optional study or 4th bedroom
* Beautiful kitchen with top of the range 900mm upright oven, range hood, dishwasher, stone
bench tops, large island bench, huge walk in pantry and feature tiled splash back,
* Awesome alfresco entertaining area complete with a ceiling fan overlooking the low
maintenance manicured backyard with a garden shed ideal for storing your garden
tools.
* Double garage with remote control door and internal access
* Ducted heating and evaporative cooling
* Top quality fixtures and fittings throughout
* Exposed aggregate concrete driveway, pathways and in the alfresco
If you are after a home that oozes style and class in a great location then look no further!
Please note: All property details listed were current at the time of publishing. Due to extreme buyer demand, some properties may have been sold in the preceding 24 hours. Therefore confirmation of all opens with the listing agent within 24 hours of their scheduled opening is advised.

Description:
DELIGHTFUL NORTH SIDE FAMILY HOME
18 months young & defined by its versatile design, immaculate presentation & convenient location, this home presents an outstanding lifestyle opportunity for families looking to secure their future as well as discerning investors and downsizers alike.
Bathed in natural light, the home's free-flowing interior comprises four generous bedrooms, master with walk-in robes & private ensuite & stylish family bathroom. Dual living zones highlight a central lounge leading through to the expansive open-plan family/dining area complemented by a well-appointed stone kitchen complete dishwasher & stainless steel cooking appliances.
Other stand-out features include ducted heating, alarm system, full laundry as well as a double remote garage with internal entry. Step outside to a north-facing backyard with extensive decking & established gardens perfect for entertaining!
Beautifully positioned North of the Highway between Beaconsfield & Officer with easy access to a large range of quality schools, both public and private, Beaconsfield & Arena shopping hubs where all you daily requirements are met with ease and convenience as well as parks, gardens , walking tracks and community centres, all being surrounded by premium homes in a quiet col de sac.

Description:
A True Lifestyle Opportunity
Perfectly positioned opposite parkland within a quiet enclave of the Arena Estate, is this beautiful home that optimises family living! With 9ft ceilings throughout, the tiled entry leads past the formal lounge and into a grand open plan family/meals area where the kitchen takes centre stage. With wide stone benchtops, 90cm upright range, dishwasher and all the storage the cook of the house could want! Located at the rear of the home a zoned rumpus room that would be perfect for a home theatre or games room.
Four bedrooms complete the accommodation with a huge master suit with oversized shower, double stone vanity and a walk in wardrobe. The three secondary bedrooms are all equipped with floor to ceiling robes and are serviced by a family bathroom with separate toilet.
Large windows flood the living areas with natural light and offer a garden vista to the landscaped rear yard. A north facing decked alfresco completes this beautiful opportunity for one lucky family.
Other notable features include- double car garage with plumbing and rear roller door access, ducted heating & cooling. With the benefits of a few minutes’ drive from a variety of local shops, schools, medical facilities and public transport options are sure to make your trips effortless.

Description:
Brand new family home in Grandvue Estate Officer
Residing within the much-admired Grandvue' estate, this well maintained residence delivers a premier lifestyle for families, downsizers or investors. Displaying an impeccable streetscape opposite a reserve featuring walking tracks, and within minutes to shops and schools, the idyllic light-filled interiors consist of both formal and informal living areas blending seamlessly with the high appointed kitchen featuring marble benchtops, Smeg appliances and butler's pantry.
Accommodation needs are fulfilled with a large master bedroom with walk-in robe and ensuite, plus three further sizable bedrooms sharing the bright and spacious family bathroom.
Further notable features include; high ceilings, fully tiled bathroom, solar hot water, ducted heating, side gate access and fully landscaped garden.
• Close proximity to schools, shops and parkland
• Combination of both formal and informal living plus meals
• Kitchen with marble benchtops, Smeg appliances
• Butlers pantry
• Master bedroom with WIR and ensuite
• 3 further bedrooms all with double built-in-robes
• Modern family bathroom, fitted laundry
• Double garage with internal access
• Ducted heating
• Solar hot water
Every care has been taken to verify the accuracy of the details in this advertisement at the time of publishing. Prospective purchasers are requested to take such action as is necessary, to satisfy themselves of any pertinent matters.

Modern Lifestyle & Perfect Location
This exceptional four-bedroom home. Perfect for first home buyers, families or the savvy investor to add to their property portfolio. The heart of the abode consists of a well-appointed kitchen with quality appliances, ample space, and great views to the yard. Adjacent is the naturally lit family meals area, which flows around to a generous living room - perfect for entertaining. Description:
Exceptional at Timbertop
Officer's premier estate Timbertop, situated only minutes from Officer, Beaconsfield and Berwick Townships.
Take a walk or bike ride around the new lake and estate, enjoy the massive parkland for the children, meals and coffee shop at the new lake, and easy access to D'Angelo's winery for lunch and a wine.
Buyers who love modern living and presentation, will appreciate this home. Street appeal and facade, offers a mixture of render, colour bond roof, timber look roll a door, stack stone, and quality landscaping. Internally, timber laminate floors provided throughout the living areas blend beautifully with the decor and soft furnishings.
The main Living/Meals/ and kitchen are bright and sunlit from the north facing aspect, combined with highlite windows provide an outstanding space and 4.2 metre ceiling(14 feet) exudes open space living. The industrial modern look kitchen comes with subway feature tiles, huge range, overhead cupboards and exhaust, stone benchtops, breakfast bar, lots of drawers and a pantry.
Adjoining Family room is spacious with outdoor access from both living and family rooms. Three excellent bedrooms, the master has also outdoor access and a huge W.I.R. and ensuite
Bedroom two has a built in robe, whilst bedroom three has a W.I.R, there is also a second bathroom and a separate powder room.
Outdoors provides a 7.5 x 6.7 metre garage with internal access, two separate outdoor areas that offer sunshine , entertainment and relaxation from the outside world.
Inspection of this home will delight, one of the nicer properties you will inspect and admire.
Insights: 50 Timbertop Boulevard, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2018 and 69 other 3 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.

Description:
Priced to sell – great 5 bedroom, 2 masters with views
Set Date Sale - last offer cut off Saturday 1st December at 5:30pm
Elevated to capture spectacular views over the valley with glistening lights and hilly ranges in the background, this magnificent 5 bedroom, 3.5 bathroom family entertainer is contemporary living made easy.
With every bedroom enjoying its own walk in robe, this superbly spacious 42sq home enjoys an elevated entry to a wide hallway, a fabulous lounge/theatre room, downstairs master bedroom suite with 2 walk in robes and a double shower ensuite; north facing tiled open plan family and dining area with an impressive stone kitchen featuring a walk in pantry; a powder room, huge laundry with under-stair storage and a sun drenched covered alfresco area in terraced gardens.
Unique with its 2nd master bedroom upstairs (WIR & ensuite), there's also a casual upstairs rumpus room that takes full advantage of the views, 3 further large bedrooms (WIRs), a stylish bathroom and 4th toilet.
With fantastic family zones for all to enjoy, this low maintenance haven includes a 5.5kW solar system, keyless entry, ducted heating, air conditioning, stone benchtops, excellent storage and an internal access double auto garage.
Opposite St Clares' Primary School & Early Learning Centre and St Francis Xavier School, an easy walk to Arena Shopping Centre, Cardinia Road train station and lovely parks, with great access to the major arterials.
Insights: 68 Majestic Drive, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2018 and 9 other 5 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.

Description:
A Lifestyle Of Abundance Awaits
When Metricon builds homes you can be assured of quality, but when they build a display home you can be assured that it will be the best of the best, and this stunning ex-display home is no doubt the best Officer has to offer. Commanding a striking street presence, you are instantly drawn to the unique garage door and the warm timber of the windows that are a feature throughout the home. Upon stepping through the front door, you are greeted with a stunning entrance which gives you a sneak peek of what’s to come. Immediately to the left you will find a spacious home office or further living area for which was its original purpose. Moving through the home a beautiful timber staircase awaits and to the right a cosy sitting room with French doors which opens out to the landscaped garden, perfect for an afternoon of reading. Through to the heart of the home you will be entranced by what you see before you, rich colours bring warmth to the open plan living and dining areas which flow seamlessly to the grand undercover alfresco area complete with strip heating, fan and built in BBQ. The stunning kitchen is a sight to behold with waterfall bench tops, top quality stainless steel appliances, integrated dishwasher, LED lighting and butler’s pantry. Upstairs you will find the master suite which leads out to its own private balcony and has its own full ensuite and walk in robe, whilst the other 3 grandioso bedrooms all have built in robes and share a beautiful central bathroom and living area. With all the features you could possibly want in a home including ducted heating, ducted cooling, surround sound to the family area, stone bench tops throughout, double garage and much more, this home is perfect for those looking for a low maintenance lifestyle who want all the luxury appointments this home provides.
Insights: 5 Kooyong Close, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2018 and 149 other 4 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.

Description:
The Cherry On Top
If you are looking for a home or investment which offers low maintenance living as well as having close proximity to all Officer has to offer, 21 Cherrington Avenue Officer is one to mark down on your inspection list for this weekend.
The two-year young modern and well-kept home is situated in the Cherrington Estate which is walking distance to Pioneer Park and easy access to all Officers schools, shops and easy access to public transport including train station and bus stops.
The home offers three well sized bedrooms, with master bedroom with full walk in robe and ensuite whilst the remaining bedrooms both feature built in robes and family bathroom and separate toilet.
A light and bright open plan kitchen which includes stone benches, 900mm standalone gas oven and cooktop as well as dishwasher and walk in pantry.
The kitchen overlooks the generous open plan family/meals which then steps out to your low maintenance courtyard with shade sail which will be ideal for kicking your shoes off after a hard day all year round.
Other great features of the home include gas ducted heating, roller blinds, downlights, single garage with remote and split system cooling.
The property is currently tenant on a periodical lease at $1560.00 per month.
To find out further information or to arrange a private viewing contact Hayley on 0488 049 143.
Identification is required at all open homes.
*All information contained therein is gathered from relevant third-party sources. We cannot guarantee or give any warranty about the information provided. Interested parties must rely solely on their own enquiries.
Confirmation of all opens with the listing agent within 24 hours of their scheduled opening is advised.

Description:
PICTURE BOOK CHARM – OFFICER
This home has been built with luxury in mind and includes a modern deluxe kitchen with stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances and large pantry that will inspire the chef of the family.
Featuring 3 bedrooms master with en-suite and walk in robe, other 2 bedrooms with built in robes. The main living/dining/kitchen areas has sliding door access to the alfresco area with a neat grassed area, the perfect atmosphere for indoor/outdoor living. Creature comforts include: gas ducted heating, air conditioning and remote single garage with internal access.
This modern home is a polished package, save yourself the hassle of building and move straight in to this completed home that is just two years old.
Nestled in the sought-after Arcadia estate, close to parklands, top primary and secondary schools and the Officer shopping area.
Block size 331 sqm

Description:
Modern & Low Maintenance!
Situated in the ideal Arena Estate, this lovely Townhouse will appeal to those investors, downsizers or first home buyers.
Come inside and discover this open-plan living and dining, served by a spacious and modern kitchen with stainless appliances and dishwasher. Whilst enjoying the convenience of the adjoining paved alfresco entertaining area overlooking easy-care landscaping.
Upstairs, you will find a sizeable master bedroom with walk-in robe and ensuite, as well as two further bedrooms with built-in robes and a family bathroom together with a lounge/retreat area for the kids.
Additional benefits include split-system heating and cooling, powder room downstairs, double remote garage and much more.
This excellent home is perfectly located – just a short stroll to Arena Shopping Centre, easy access to public transport and the freeway, plus there are great local schools nearby!

Description:
Green Outlook
A fantastic size allotment of 392m2 with generous frontage of 14m, you not only have a great sized backyard but also a huge extension of your side yard, with a pocket green reserve right next door!
Skymont’s masterplan design provides quality streetscapes which compliments the existing landscape.
A mixture of exotic and native species which provide year round interest, presents a unique identity and a range of experiences for future residents to enjoy.
Skymont offers a lifestyle of convenience with established amenities and infrastructure, like Arena Shopping Village and Officer Train Station just minutes away.
With 12 highly regarded schools, both public and private in the immediate area your family’s education needs are well catered for. Close to the proposed Gurdwarra. It's time for you and your family to have room to soar!
SALES OFFICE ADDRESS
155 Peck Road, Officer VIC 3809
Open 11am – 3:30pm Saturday & Sunday. Midweek by Appointment.
ENQUIRIES: Chris White 0408 408 446
WWW.SKYMONT.COM.AU

Description:
Contemporary Living in Officer
This contemporary townhouse offers instant appeal with its modern façade, waterpark facing and its fantastic location. Situated in Arcadia Estate, this Officer estate is highly sought after for its affordability and location.
Step inside this modern beauty and enter the heart of the home. With a light filled contemporary gourmet kitchen equipped with stone benches, glass splashback, stainless steel appliances, walk in pantry and breakfast bar with adjoining meals area overlooking the wetlands. Continuing through the home, into the spacious living room boasting with natural light which oversees the outdoor courtyard and easy to maintain backyard.
Upstairs offering three spacious bedrooms, the master bedroom with built in robes and balcony overlooking the gorgeous water lands and the additional two bedrooms with built in robes are serviced by the functional main bathroom with separate powder room.
Double remote control garage, limited maintenance gardens to the front and back yard with new decking that is simply stunning, split system air conditioning all standard
If location is what matters to you look no further, shops, public transport, easy freeway access, schools and more all minutes away from your front door.
Whether you're an investor, first home buyer or downsizing, this home is sure to tick all the right boxes and won't last long!
Insights: 8/7 Cyan Crescent, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2018 and 3 other 3 bedroom unit in Officer have recently been sold.

Description:
1059sqm Block In Timbertop
Are you looking to build your dream home but can’t find a block of land big enough? Then look no further than this! In Officer’s most sought after estate you will find this magnificent corner allotment ready for you to build. Boasting 1059sqm of relatively flat land, choose your builder and start building for a better future. With Timbertop a community unto itself with ongoing events throughout the year and located centrally to shops, schools, café’s public transport and the freeway don’t hesitate in securing this block today.
